summary: This is a modification that adds to your character a brilliant tattoo on the back. Convince yourself!
descriptionHtml:
Hey this is my new mod:

I was bored, so I added to my character a tattoo. It\'s a matter of taste whether you like it or not. But I found that the result looks so good that I must give you the mod for download.

So I hope you like it.

[At the moment it is created only for male characters!]

(If there are any problems, just write me a comment or a message that I can improve it.)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

installation: 

extract the folder from the .zip-file into your data folder (in the Skyrim Installation directory)

That\'s all! :D

To deinstall, just delete the copied folder manually.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Best wishes,

your P.M. aka MeisterDerSchatten
author: MeisterDerSchatten
